trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A KeyPressEventArgs specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: Un KeyPressEventArgs specifica il carattere che è costituito da quando l'utente preme un tasto.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property returns an uppercase K. A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event occurs when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando l'utente preme MAIUSC + K, la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>restituisce k in maiuscolo. Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento si verifica quando l'utente preme un tasto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two events that are closely related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: Due eventi strettamente correlati all' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento sono <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event precedes each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event when the user presses a key, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event occurs when the user releases a key.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>evento precede ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento quando l'utente preme un tasto e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>evento si verifica quando l'utente rilascia un tasto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: When the user holds down a key, duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> events occur each time the character repeats.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente tiene premuto un tasto, duplicare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>gli eventi si verificano ogni volta che il carattere è ripetuto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event is generated upon release.
trans-unit.target: Una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>evento viene generato al momento di versione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: With each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, a KeyPressEventArgs is passed.
trans-unit.target: Con ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento, che viene passato un KeyPressEventArgs.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>viene passato a ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>Specifica se insieme a un'altra chiave sono stati premuti i tasti di modifica (CTRL, MAIUSC o ALT).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (This modifier information can also be obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.) Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: (Queste informazioni modificatore possono anche essere ottenute tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe.)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> Impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>a `true` per annullare il `KeyPress` evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This keeps the control from processing the key press.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo il controllo di elaborare la pressione del tasto.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some controls will process certain key strokes on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alcuni controlli elaborerà alcune sequenze di tasti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> processes the Enter key before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> is called.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>Elabora il tasto INVIO prima <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: In such cases, you cannot cancel the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, and must cancel the key stroke from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: In questi casi, è possibile annullare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>evento e deve annullare la sequenza di tasti da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>invece.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sul modello di eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the current state of the modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà da ottenere lo stato corrente dei tasti di modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character corresponding to the key the user pressed.
trans-unit.target: Il carattere ASCII corrispondente al tasto premuto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> evento è stato gestito.

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing.
trans-unit.target: Se l'evento non viene gestita, verrà inviato al sistema operativo per l'elaborazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: Set Handled to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: Impostare Handled `true` per annullare il `KeyPress` evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'evento è gestito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il carattere corrispondente al tasto premuto.

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyChar property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà KeyChar per le sequenze di tasti di esempio in fase di esecuzione e modificarle in circostanze speciali in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use KeyChar to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare KeyChar per disabilitare le sequenze di tasti non numerico quando l'utente immette un codice postale, modificare alfabetiche tutti in maiuscolo in un campo di immissione dati, o monitorare la tastiera o altri dispositivi di input per determinate combinazioni di tasti.

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the following keys: - a-z, A-Z.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere o impostare le chiavi seguenti: - a-z, a-Z.

trans-unit.source: - CTRL.
trans-unit.target: -CTRL.

trans-unit.source: - Punctuation marks.
trans-unit.target: -Segni di punteggiatura.

trans-unit.source: - Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad.
trans-unit.target: -Numero di chiavi, sia nella parte superiore della tastiera e del tastierino numerico.

trans-unit.source: - ENTER.
trans-unit.target: -IMMETTERE.

trans-unit.source: You cannot get or set the following keys: - The TAB key.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere o impostare le chiavi seguenti:-chiave scheda.

trans-unit.source: - INSERT and DELETE.
trans-unit.target: -INSERT e DELETE.

trans-unit.source: - HOME.
trans-unit.target: -HOME.

trans-unit.source: - END.
trans-unit.target: -END.

trans-unit.source: - PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN.
trans-unit.target: -PGSU e PGGIÙ.

trans-unit.source: - ALT.
trans-unit.target: -ALT.

trans-unit.source: - Arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: -Tasti di direzione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per informazioni su come rilevare eventuali chiavi non carattere indicate in precedenza, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character that is composed.
trans-unit.target: Carattere ASCII che viene composto.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'utente preme MAIUSC + K, questa proprietà restituisce k in maiuscolo.
